Summary Note:
Aada Koskinen and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Helsinki. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Aada Koskinen is a 44 year old Wealth Manager from Finland. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
She decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Aada Koskinen is married to Virtanen. Their children are named Anniina, Tiainen and Katriina.
Education Background:
Aada obtained her secondary school diploma from Salpausselän lukio in 2000.
Aada earned her degree from Åbo Akademi University School of Economics in 2004.
Occupation History:
Aada Koskinen is a seasoned professional with over 21 years of experience.
In 2004, Aada Koskinen started working as a Financial Advisor at Nordea Private Banking, marking the beginning of her successful career.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Portfolio Manager at Danske Bank Wealth Management in 2007, further expanding her skill set.
From 2011 till now, she served as a Wealth Manager at Danske Bank Wealth Management, solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 430000 EUR.
She has townhouse located in Mikkeli, worth 1060000 EUR.

In addition to her primary residence, she owns townhouse in Pori worth 1070000 EUR.

She inherited a significant sum of 1150000 EUR from her mother, a respected Investment Banker, in 2015, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
